data.name: SpellTome
data.detailed_description:
SpellTome is a story driven 2D adventure platformer set in a fantasy world. You will explore a lakeside castle, navigate it's corridors and floors, dodge traps and fight magically animated weapons, armor, and more. The game follows our magic blinded protagonist on his path to steal, ehem, borrow the fabled SpellTome and uncover it's magic secrets.


DODGE DEADLY ENEMIES

SCALE DIFFERENT PLATFORMS

FIRE SPELLS!

EVADE TRAPS!

What is Unique about SpellTome?
SpellTome is different to other platformers by using a combination of mouse and keyboard to deliver fast and precise combat. The other defining feature is the complete lack of melee weapons. As the game is based on the story of a wizard the game doesn't feature melee combat, since we all know that wizards don't do knives.

FEATURES:
-Different endings depending on your skill and detective abilities.
-Multiple randomly selected levels allow replayability while keeping the polish of hand made levels
-Difficult enemies
-Platforming levels
-Boss encounters
-Custom sound design
-Environmental story telling
-Fast and sweet gameplay that will hopefully tickle your imagination

Will you be able to unravel the secrets of this ancient castle now wizarding vault?

data.short_description: SpellTome is a story driven fantasy adventure 2D platformer. Hurl balls of magic, dash across levels, and jump over obstacles while trying to get the fabled SpellTome.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disclaimer: These are the current PC requirements, with future updates they are prone to change
